## OmvDecoderOptions interface

Internal interface for options passed from the \[\[OmvDataSource\]\] to the decoder.


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface OmvDecoderOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [createTileInfo](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdecoderoptions.createtileinfo.md) | boolean |  |
|  [enableElevationOverlay](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdecoderoptions.enableelevationoverlay.md) | boolean |  |
|  [featureModifiers](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdecoderoptions.featuremodifiers.md) | [FeatureModifierId](./harp-omv-datasource.featuremodifierid.md)<!-- -->\[\] | List of user specified \[\[OmvFeatureModifier\]\]s, list order declares the order of processing.<!-- -->Each identifier is used to choose corresponding OmvFeatureModifier, if undefined at least \[\[OmvGenericFeatureModifier\]\] is added to decoder. |
|  [filterDescription](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdecoderoptions.filterdescription.md) | [OmvFeatureFilterDescription](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfeaturefilterdescription.md) \| null | A description for the feature filter which can be safely passed down to the web workers. It has to be generated with the help of the \[\[OmvFeatureFilterDescriptionBuilder\]\] (to guarantee the correctness). |
|  [gatherFeatureAttributes](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdecoderoptions.gatherfeatureattributes.md) | boolean | Gather feature attributes from \[\[OmvData\]\]. Defaults to false. |
|  [gatherRoadSegments](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdecoderoptions.gatherroadsegments.md) | boolean |  |
|  [politicalView](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdecoderoptions.politicalview.md) | string | Country code (lower-case ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) defining optional point of view to be used. Set to empty string ("") if you want to use default (widely accepted) point of view. If set to <code>undefined</code> leaves current political view decoder configuration. |
|  [showMissingTechniques](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdecoderoptions.showmissingtechniques.md) | boolean | If true, features that have no technique in the theme will be printed to the console (can be excessive!). |
|  [skipShortLabels](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdecoderoptions.skipshortlabels.md) | boolean | If not set to <code>false</code> very short text labels will be skipped during decoding based on a heuristic. |
|  [storageLevelOffset](./harp-omv-datasource.omvdecoderoptions.storageleveloffset.md) | number | Optional storage level offset for \[\[Tile\]\]s. Default is -2. |
